phrs.translation: 嘉年华会, 巡回演艺团, 巡回游艺团, 刘佧妮

sentences.sentence: And tell them I work as a carny?
sentences.translation: 然后告诉他们我在游乐场工作?。

sentences.sentence: Was your mother an evil carny who raised you in a wicker birdcage under the streets of Paris?
sentences.translation: 莫非你妈妈是一个邪恶巡回演员，在巴黎街头的鸟笼里把你养大？
